description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              ** Reporting: General Director, TRUMPF Vietnam
              

              ** Job purpose:
              
              The main responsibilities of the role would include sales, business development, marketing and customer relationship management in assigned region, Haiphong Area.
              

              ** Primary Duties & Responsibilities:
              
              •	Achieve the budgeted sales within the assigned sales area Haiphong in line with the objectives set for turnover and margins.
              
              •	Identify and develop business opportunities with new and existing customers.
              
              •	Responsible for the total customer management within the assigned sales area Haiphong.
              
              •	Responsible for customer visits, techno-commercial discussion, machine demonstration, order closing, post sales payment follow up, site surveys, etc.
              
              •	Plan and prepare well in advance for all the activities like customer visits, demo, training etc. as per the defined process for a superior customer experience.
              
              •	Maintain necessary and appropriate call rates to achieve the company objectives of satisfied existing customers and a good coverage for the new customers.
              
              •	Be fully involved and responsible for all the marketing activities like exhibitions, customer evenings, Technology days, delegations etc. for the assigned area.
              
              •	Maintaining and updating to CRM Software on a daily basis, track sales progress and prepare sales reports, follow general and departmental procedures
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	More than 4 years of job experience in B2B sales especially in CNC machine business
              
              •	Knowledge of bending, punching, laser cutting machines as a plus
              
              •	Business network in Haiphong Area as a plus
              
              •	Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering / Management or equivalent related experience
              
              •	Motivation for sales and for buildup of customer relationships
              
              •	Vietnamese native and excellent verbal and written English communication skills
              
              •	Excellent negotiation and closing skills
              
              •	Good communication skills, independently working, self-driven, result-oriented, highly motivated
              
              •	Ability to organize multiple tasks, analyze and solve problems in a fast-paced environment
              
              •	Professional team player
              
              •	MS office (Word, PowerPoint and Excel)
              
              •	Willingness to travel across Vietnam (and occasionally to Singapore/ Germany)
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
